It would have been hard and very costly to shoot through the base's 
walls. They are not easily melted and with the autoguns firing at 
Dracona, it would be very costly. What you said in your post is:

Dracona knew of this, that's
why she had HER base have autoguns as well, she retreated into her 
base and
had her autoguns fire upon the base's autoguns...... "Zardus, i'm a 
genius,
i came prepared for this!....lets just work this out!..." Dracona 
said.....

It has nothing about melting walls or sabotauging autoguns. As it is 
stated, this post is impossible because the door was closed in the 
first
